This is the Hitman codename 47 game, but its not the one i remember when it came out in 2001.
Someone has change the menu music to some piano garbage, and removed all the level tracks. now dont get me rong i love pianos, but the soundtrack to this game was half the fun. if anyone knows how to restore the original soundtrack please let me know. thank you and long live 47.
